item.description:
As of now there are 35 people signed up between the two meetups, so don't be late! First come first serve!

This event has been cross-posted to Social Fun.

Meet at reserved tables (each tour will be assigned their own table) at John Harvards Brew House with the option of taking a tour of their brewery! John Harvards also offers Beer Flights (they call it their "sampler") which is the same price as a draft beer but totals 20 oz. 

Each tour lasts approximately 20 minutes. Maximum of seven people per tour. Last tour is at 6 PM. First come, first serve.

John Harvard's wants this "pay as you go" per table (tour) so please bring cash to settle your table's tab before each tour.

During the tour, we will learn the basics of John Harvard's brewing process, experience tastings at different stages of brewing, learn to understand the standard equipment, how brewers decide what goes into each batch, etc.

If you split a pitcher with others please remember to pay a share!!Please add at least 25% tax and tip to your final amount.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the reception desk where the reserved tables are
item.name: Free Tour of the Brewery-- John Harvards!
